ch0245_90_mary/0101_0701_01_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! You finally came!
I was waitin’ for ya!
ch0245_90_mary/0101_0701_02_10: OK then, let’s go! Let’s train together today!
ch0245_90_mary/7101_0701_01_10:
Apparently, Moltres from the Kanto region look
slightly different from Galarian ones.
ch0245_90_mary/7101_0701_02_10:
But I think Galarian Moltres is a perfect match
for me!
ch0245_90_mary/7102_0701_01_10:
I battled many rivals during Galar’s
Gym Challenge...
ch0245_90_mary/7102_0701_02_10:
If I battle them now, I’m sure to win!
I’ve powered up a lot!
ch0245_90_mary/7103_0701_01_10:
Team Yell can get a little rough with others when
they cheer for me and Big Bro.
ch0245_90_mary/7103_0701_02_10:
If Team Yell ever troubles you, just let me or
Big Bro know!
ch0245_90_mary/7104_0701_01_10:
Although they’re both islands, Pasio and the Galar
region’s Isle of Armor are very different.
ch0245_90_mary/7104_0701_02_10:
One’s artificial and the other is natural, but both
are good in their own way!
ch0245_90_mary/7105_0701_01_10:
I love Spikemuth! That’s why I want to do
everything I can to bring energy to the town!
ch0245_90_mary/7105_0701_02_10:
I want you to help me think of ways to attract
people to Spikemuth, [Name:PlayerNickname ].
ch0245_90_mary/1701_0701_01_10: Here you are! I was looking for ya to give ya this.
ch0245_90_mary/1701_0702_01_10:
I just happened to have too many of these, so
you can take it!
ch0245_90_mary/2501_0701_01_10:
Maybe I should make Moltres the symbol of
Spikemuth, to attract more people?
ch0245_90_mary/2501_0701_02_10:
After all, my Moltres’s colors are similar to
Spikemuth’s Gym uniform.
ch0245_90_mary/2501_0701_03_10:
Plus, Moltres is a Legendary Pokémon! I bet
everyone would wanna come see it!
ch0245_90_mary/2501_0702_01_10:
I’m gonna ask everyone in Team Yell to make
merchandise using Moltres as a motif!
ch0245_90_mary/2501_0702_02_10:
What do ya think about towels and flags? They
can be used for cheerin’!
ch0245_90_mary/2511_0701_01_10: Don’t ya think I smile better than before?
ch0245_90_mary/2511_0701_02_10:
It’s because I’ve been practicing! I need to
improve so I can meet everyone’s cheers with
a smile.
ch0245_90_mary/2511_0702_03_10:
Yeah, that’s a great smile! I’ve gotta practice
even more!
ch0245_90_mary/3001_0701_01_10: You seem tired. Wanna battle me to wake up?
ch0245_90_mary/3003_0701_01_10: I feel like exercising after eatin’. Wanna join?
ch0245_90_mary/3005_0701_01_10:
Looks dark outside already. Wanna talk strategy
instead of trainin’?
